title: Biała Nyska
text:
Biała Nyska () is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Nysa">Gmina Nysa</a>, within <a href="Nysa%20County">Nysa County</a>, <a href="Opole%20Voivodeship">Opole Voivodeship</a>, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-west of <a href="Nysa%2C%20Poland">Nysa</a> and south-west of the regional capital <a href="Opole">Opole</a>.
Before 1945 the area was part of Germany (see "<a href="Territorial%20changes%20of%20Poland%20after%20World%20War%20II">Territorial changes of Poland after World War II</a>").
